subject: Soccer
Presidential Election of 2016
Immigration and Emigration
Discrimination
Gold Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Trump’s assertion that Mexicans coming to the United States were drug traffickers, rapists and other criminals did not go unnoticed at Mexico’s first match in the tournament.
snippet: Trump’s assertion that Mexicans coming to the United States were drug traffickers, rapists and other criminals did not go unnoticed at Mexico’s first match in the tournament.
